00088 static DdNode * addBddDoStrictThreshold ARGS((DdManager *dd, DdNode *f, DdNode *val));

00118 DdNode *
00119 Cudd_addBddThreshold(
00120   DdManager * dd,
00121   DdNode * f,
00122   CUDD_VALUE_TYPE  value)
00123 {
00124     DdNode *res;
00125     DdNode *val;
00126     
00127     val = cuddUniqueConst(dd,value);
00128     if (val == NULL) return(NULL);
00129     cuddRef(val);
00130 
00131     do {
00132         dd->reordered = 0;
00133         res = addBddDoThreshold(dd, f, val);
00134     } while (dd->reordered == 1);
00135 
00136     if (res == NULL) {
00137         Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd, val);
00138         return(NULL);
00139     }
00140     cuddRef(res);
00141     Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd, val);
00142     cuddDeref(res);
00143     return(res);
00144 
00145 } /* end of Cudd_addBddThreshold */

00208 DdNode *
00209 Cudd_addBddInterval(
00210   DdManager * dd,
00211   DdNode * f,
00212   CUDD_VALUE_TYPE  lower,
00213   CUDD_VALUE_TYPE  upper)
00214 {
00215     DdNode *res;
00216     DdNode *l;
00217     DdNode *u;
00218     
00219     /* Create constant nodes for the interval bounds, so that we can use
00220     ** the global cache.
00221     */
00222     l = cuddUniqueConst(dd,lower);
00223     if (l == NULL) return(NULL);
00224     cuddRef(l);
00225     u = cuddUniqueConst(dd,upper);
00226     if (u == NULL) {
00227         Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd,l);
00228         return(NULL);
00229     }
00230     cuddRef(u);
00231 
00232     do {
00233         dd->reordered = 0;
00234         res = addBddDoInterval(dd, f, l, u);
00235     } while (dd->reordered == 1);
00236 
00237     if (res == NULL) {
00238         Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd, l);
00239         Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd, u);
00240         return(NULL);
00241     }
00242     cuddRef(res);
00243     Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd, l);
00244     Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd, u);
00245     cuddDeref(res);
00246     return(res);
00247 
00248 } /* end of Cudd_addBddInterval */

00280     if (index == NULL) return(NULL);
00281     cuddRef(index);
00282 
00283     do {
00284         dd->reordered = 0;
00285         res = addBddDoIthBit(dd, f, index);
00286     } while (dd->reordered == 1);
00287 
00288     if (res == NULL) {
00289         Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd, index);
00290         return(NULL);
00291     }
00292     cuddRef(res);

00372 DdNode *
00373 Cudd_bddTransfer(
00374   DdManager * ddSource,
00375   DdManager * ddDestination,
00376   DdNode * f)
00377 {
00378     DdNode *res;
00379     do {
00380         ddDestination->reordered = 0;
00381         res = cuddBddTransfer(ddSource, ddDestination, f);
00382     } while (ddDestination->reordered == 1);
00383     return(res);
00384 
00385 } /* end of Cudd_bddTransfer */

00392 
00406 DdNode *
00407 cuddBddTransfer(
00408   DdManager * ddS,
00409   DdManager * ddD,
00410   DdNode * f)
00411 {
00412     DdNode *res;
00413     st_table *table = NULL;
00414     st_generator *gen = NULL;
00415     DdNode *key, *value;
00416 
00417     table = st_init_table(st_ptrcmp,st_ptrhash);
00418     if (table == NULL) goto failure;
00419     res = cuddBddTransferRecur(ddS, ddD, f, table);
00420     if (res != NULL) cuddRef(res);
00421 
00422     /* Dereference all elements in the table and dispose of the table.
00423     ** This must be done also if res is NULL to avoid leaks in case of
00424     ** reordering. */
00425     gen = st_init_gen(table);
00426     if (gen == NULL) goto failure;
00427     while (st_gen(gen, (char **) &key, (char **) &value)) {
00428         Cudd_RecursiveDeref(ddD, value);
00429     }
00430     st_free_gen(gen); gen = NULL;
00431     st_free_table(table); table = NULL;
00432 
00433     if (res != NULL) cuddDeref(res);
00434     return(res);
00435 
00436 failure:
00437     if (table != NULL) st_free_table(table);
00438     if (gen != NULL) st_free_gen(gen);
00439     return(NULL);
00440 
00441 } /* end of cuddBddTransfer */

00461 static DdNode *
00462 addBddDoThreshold(
00463   DdManager * dd,
00464   DdNode * f,
00465   DdNode * val)
00466 {
00467     DdNode *res, *T, *E;
00468     DdNode *fv, *fvn;
00469     int v;
00470 
00471     /* Check terminal case. */
00472     if (cuddIsConstant(f)) {
00473         return(Cudd_NotCond(DD_ONE(dd),cuddV(f) < cuddV(val)));
00474     }
00475 
00476     /* Check cache. */
00477     res = cuddCacheLookup2(dd,addBddDoThreshold,f,val);
00478     if (res != NULL) return(res);
00479 
00480     /* Recursive step. */
00481     v = f->index;
00482     fv = cuddT(f); fvn = cuddE(f);
00483 
00484     T = addBddDoThreshold(dd,fv,val);
00485     if (T == NULL) return(NULL);
00486     cuddRef(T);
00487 
00488     E = addBddDoThreshold(dd,fvn,val);
00489     if (E == NULL) {
00490         Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd, T);
00491         return(NULL);
00492     }
00493     cuddRef(E);
00494     if (Cudd_IsComplement(T)) {
00495         res = (T == E) ? Cudd_Not(T) : cuddUniqueInter(dd,v,Cudd_Not(T),Cudd_Not(E));
00496         if (res == NULL) {
00497             Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd, T);
00498             Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd, E);
00499             return(NULL);
00500         }
00501         res = Cudd_Not(res);
00502     } else {
00503         res = (T == E) ? T : cuddUniqueInter(dd,v,T,E);
00504         if (res == NULL) {
00505             Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd, T);
00506             Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd, E);
00507             return(NULL);
00508         }
00509     }
00510     cuddDeref(T);
00511     cuddDeref(E);
00512 
00513     /* Store result. */
00514     cuddCacheInsert2(dd,addBddDoThreshold,f,val,res);
00515 
00516     return(res);
00517 
00518 } /* end of addBddDoThreshold */
00519

00533 static DdNode *
00534 addBddDoStrictThreshold(
00535   DdManager * dd,
00536   DdNode * f,
00537   DdNode * val)
00538 {
00539     DdNode *res, *T, *E;
00540     DdNode *fv, *fvn;
00541     int v;
00542 
00543     /* Check terminal case. */
00544     if (cuddIsConstant(f)) {
00545         return(Cudd_NotCond(DD_ONE(dd),cuddV(f) <= cuddV(val)));
00546     }
00547 
00548     /* Check cache. */
00549     res = cuddCacheLookup2(dd,addBddDoStrictThreshold,f,val);
00550     if (res != NULL) return(res);
00551 
00552     /* Recursive step. */
00553     v = f->index;
00554     fv = cuddT(f); fvn = cuddE(f);
00555 
00556     T = addBddDoStrictThreshold(dd,fv,val);
00557     if (T == NULL) return(NULL);
00558     cuddRef(T);
00559 
00560     E = addBddDoStrictThreshold(dd,fvn,val);
00561     if (E == NULL) {
00562         Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd, T);
00563         return(NULL);
00564     }
00565     cuddRef(E);
00566     if (Cudd_IsComplement(T)) {
00567         res = (T == E) ? Cudd_Not(T) : cuddUniqueInter(dd,v,Cudd_Not(T),Cudd_Not(E));
00568         if (res == NULL) {
00569             Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd, T);
00570             Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd, E);
00571             return(NULL);
00572         }
00573         res = Cudd_Not(res);
00574     } else {
00575         res = (T == E) ? T : cuddUniqueInter(dd,v,T,E);
00576         if (res == NULL) {
00577             Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd, T);
00578             Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd, E);
00579             return(NULL);
00580         }
00581     }
00582     cuddDeref(T);
00583     cuddDeref(E);
00584 
00585     /* Store result. */
00586     cuddCacheInsert2(dd,addBddDoStrictThreshold,f,val,res);
00587 
00588     return(res);
00589 
00590 } /* end of addBddDoStrictThreshold */

00605 static DdNode *
00606 addBddDoInterval(
00607   DdManager * dd,
00608   DdNode * f,
00609   DdNode * l,
00610   DdNode * u)
00611 {
00612     DdNode *res, *T, *E;
00613     DdNode *fv, *fvn;
00614     int v;
00615 
00616     /* Check terminal case. */
00617     if (cuddIsConstant(f)) {
00618         return(Cudd_NotCond(DD_ONE(dd),cuddV(f) < cuddV(l) || cuddV(f) > cuddV(u)));
00619     }
00620 
00621     /* Check cache. */
00622     res = cuddCacheLookup(dd,addBddDoInterval,f,l,u);
00623     if (res != NULL) return(res);
00624 
00625     /* Recursive step. */
00626     v = f->index;
00627     fv = cuddT(f); fvn = cuddE(f);
00628 
00629     T = addBddDoInterval(dd,fv,l,u);
00630     if (T == NULL) return(NULL);
00631     cuddRef(T);
00632 
00633     E = addBddDoInterval(dd,fvn,l,u);
00634     if (E == NULL) {
00635         Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd, T);
00636         return(NULL);
00637     }
00638     cuddRef(E);
00639     if (Cudd_IsComplement(T)) {
00640         res = (T == E) ? Cudd_Not(T) : cuddUniqueInter(dd,v,Cudd_Not(T),Cudd_Not(E));
00641         if (res == NULL) {
00642             Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd, T);
00643             Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd, E);
00644             return(NULL);
00645         }
00646         res = Cudd_Not(res);
00647     } else {
00648         res = (T == E) ? T : cuddUniqueInter(dd,v,T,E);
00649         if (res == NULL) {
00650             Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd, T);
00651             Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd, E);
00652             return(NULL);
00653         }
00654     }
00655     cuddDeref(T);
00656     cuddDeref(E);
00657 
00658     /* Store result. */
00659     cuddCacheInsert(dd,addBddDoInterval,f,l,u,res);
00660 
00661     return(res);
00662 
00663 } /* end of addBddDoInterval */

00678 static DdNode *
00679 addBddDoIthBit(
00680   DdManager * dd,
00681   DdNode * f,
00682   DdNode * index)
00683 {
00684     DdNode *res, *T, *E;
00685     DdNode *fv, *fvn;
00686     int mask, value;
00687     int v;
00688 
00689     /* Check terminal case. */
00690     if (cuddIsConstant(f)) {
00691         mask = 1 << ((int) cuddV(index));
00692         value = (int) cuddV(f);
00693         return(Cudd_NotCond(DD_ONE(dd),(value & mask) == 0));
00694     }
00695 
00696     /* Check cache. */
00697     res = cuddCacheLookup2(dd,addBddDoIthBit,f,index);
00698     if (res != NULL) return(res);
00699 
00700     /* Recursive step. */
00701     v = f->index;
00702     fv = cuddT(f); fvn = cuddE(f);
00703 
00704     T = addBddDoIthBit(dd,fv,index);
00705     if (T == NULL) return(NULL);
00706     cuddRef(T);
00707 
00708     E = addBddDoIthBit(dd,fvn,index);
00709     if (E == NULL) {
00710         Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd, T);
00711         return(NULL);
00712     }
00713     cuddRef(E);
00714     if (Cudd_IsComplement(T)) {
00715         res = (T == E) ? Cudd_Not(T) : cuddUniqueInter(dd,v,Cudd_Not(T),Cudd_Not(E));
00716         if (res == NULL) {
00717             Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd, T);
00718             Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd, E);
00719             return(NULL);
00720         }
00721         res = Cudd_Not(res);
00722     } else {
00723         res = (T == E) ? T : cuddUniqueInter(dd,v,T,E);
00724         if (res == NULL) {
00725             Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd, T);
00726             Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd, E);
00727             return(NULL);
00728         }
00729     }
00730     cuddDeref(T);
00731     cuddDeref(E);
00732 
00733     /* Store result. */
00734     cuddCacheInsert2(dd,addBddDoIthBit,f,index,res);
00735 
00736     return(res);
00737 
00738 } /* end of addBddDoIthBit */

00753 static DdNode *
00754 ddBddToAddRecur(
00755   DdManager * dd,
00756   DdNode * B)
00757 {
00758     DdNode *one;
00759     DdNode *res, *res1, *T, *E, *Bt, *Be;
00760     int complement = 0;
00761 
00762     one = DD_ONE(dd);
00763 
00764     if (Cudd_IsConstant(B)) {
00765         if (B == one) {
00766             res = one;
00767         } else {
00768             res = DD_ZERO(dd);
00769         }
00770         return(res);
00771     }
00772     /* Check visited table */
00773     res = cuddCacheLookup1(dd,ddBddToAddRecur,B);
00774     if (res != NULL) return(res);
00775 
00776     if (Cudd_IsComplement(B)) {
00777         complement = 1;
00778         Bt = cuddT(Cudd_Regular(B));
00779         Be = cuddE(Cudd_Regular(B));
00780     } else {
00781         Bt = cuddT(B);
00782         Be = cuddE(B);
00783     }
00784 
00785     T = ddBddToAddRecur(dd, Bt);
00786     if (T == NULL) return(NULL);
00787     cuddRef(T);
00788 
00789     E = ddBddToAddRecur(dd, Be);
00790     if (E == NULL) {
00791         Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd, T);
00792         return(NULL);
00793     }
00794     cuddRef(E);
00795 
00796     /* No need to check for T == E, because it is guaranteed not to happen. */
00797     res = cuddUniqueInter(dd, (int) Cudd_Regular(B)->index, T, E);
00798     if (res == NULL) {
00799         Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd ,T);
00800         Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd ,E);
00801         return(NULL);
00802     }
00803     cuddDeref(T);
00804     cuddDeref(E);
00805 
00806     if (complement) {
00807         cuddRef(res);
00808         res1 = cuddAddCmplRecur(dd, res);
00809         if (res1 == NULL) {
00810             Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd, res);
00811             return(NULL);
00812         }
00813         cuddRef(res1);
00814         Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd, res);
00815         res = res1;
00816         cuddDeref(res);
00817     }
00818 
00819     /* Store result. */
00820     cuddCacheInsert1(dd,ddBddToAddRecur,B,res);
00821 
00822     return(res);
00823 
00824 } /* end of ddBddToAddRecur */
00825 
00826 
00839 static DdNode *
00840 addBddDoPattern(
00841   DdManager * dd,
00842   DdNode * f)
00843 {
00844     DdNode *res, *T, *E;
00845     DdNode *fv, *fvn;
00846     int v;
00847 
00848     /* Check terminal case. */
00849     if (cuddIsConstant(f)) {
00850         return(Cudd_NotCond(DD_ONE(dd),f == DD_ZERO(dd)));
00851     }
00852 
00853     /* Check cache. */
00854     res = cuddCacheLookup1(dd,Cudd_addBddPattern,f);
00855     if (res != NULL) return(res);
00856 
00857     /* Recursive step. */
00858     v = f->index;
00859     fv = cuddT(f); fvn = cuddE(f);
00860 
00861     T = addBddDoPattern(dd,fv);
00862     if (T == NULL) return(NULL);
00863     cuddRef(T);
00864 
00865     E = addBddDoPattern(dd,fvn);
00866     if (E == NULL) {
00867         Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd, T);
00868         return(NULL);
00869     }
00870     cuddRef(E);
00871     if (Cudd_IsComplement(T)) {
00872         res = (T == E) ? Cudd_Not(T) : cuddUniqueInter(dd,v,Cudd_Not(T),Cudd_Not(E));
00873         if (res == NULL) {
00874             Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd, T);
00875             Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd, E);
00876             return(NULL);
00877         }
00878         res = Cudd_Not(res);
00879     } else {
00880         res = (T == E) ? T : cuddUniqueInter(dd,v,T,E);
00881         if (res == NULL) {
00882             Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd, T);
00883             Cudd_RecursiveDeref(dd, E);
00884             return(NULL);
00885         }
00886     }
00887     cuddDeref(T);
00888     cuddDeref(E);
00889 
00890     /* Store result. */
00891     cuddCacheInsert1(dd,Cudd_addBddPattern,f,res);
00892 
00893     return(res);
00894 
00895 } /* end of addBddDoPattern */

00897 
00910 static DdNode *
00911 cuddBddTransferRecur(
00912   DdManager * ddS,
00913   DdManager * ddD,
00914   DdNode * f,
00915   st_table * table)
00916 {
00917     DdNode *ft, *fe, *t, *e, *var, *res;
00918     DdNode *one, *zero;
00919     int    index;
00920     int    comple = 0;
00921 
00922     one = DD_ONE(ddD);
00923     comple = Cudd_IsComplement(f);
00924 
00925     /* Trivial cases. */
00926     if (Cudd_IsConstant(f)) return(Cudd_NotCond(one, comple));
00927 
00928     /* Make canonical to increase the utilization of the cache. */
00929     f = Cudd_NotCond(f,comple);
00930     /* Now f is a regular pointer to a non-constant node. */
00931 
00932     /* Check the cache. */
00933     if(st_lookup(table, (char *)f, (char **) &res))
00934         return(Cudd_NotCond(res,comple));
00935     
00936     /* Recursive step. */
00937     index = f->index;
00938     ft = cuddT(f); fe = cuddE(f);
00939 
00940     t = cuddBddTransferRecur(ddS, ddD, ft, table);
00941     if (t == NULL) {
00942         return(NULL);
00943     }
00944     cuddRef(t);
00945 
00946     e = cuddBddTransferRecur(ddS, ddD, fe, table);
00947     if (e == NULL) {
00948         Cudd_RecursiveDeref(ddD, t);
00949         return(NULL);
00950     }
00951     cuddRef(e);
00952 
00953     zero = Cudd_Not(one);
00954     var = cuddUniqueInter(ddD,index,one,zero);
00955     if (var == NULL) {
00956         Cudd_RecursiveDeref(ddD, t);
00957         Cudd_RecursiveDeref(ddD, e);
00958         return(NULL);
00959     }
00960     res = cuddBddIteRecur(ddD,var,t,e);
00961     if (res == NULL) {
00962         Cudd_RecursiveDeref(ddD, t);
00963         Cudd_RecursiveDeref(ddD, e);
00964         return(NULL);
00965     }
00966     cuddRef(res);
00967     Cudd_RecursiveDeref(ddD, t);
00968     Cudd_RecursiveDeref(ddD, e);
00969 
00970     if (st_add_direct(table, (char *) f, (char *) res) == ST_OUT_OF_MEM) {
00971         Cudd_RecursiveDeref(ddD, res);
00972         return(NULL);
00973     }
00974     return(Cudd_NotCond(res,comple));
00975 
00976 } /* end of cuddBddTransferRecur */
